actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to contract for hospital care and medical services for veterans with service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to contract for hosipital care and medical services for veterans with service-connected disabilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to contract for hospital care and medical services for veterans with service-connected disabilities.
